entry.title: Monday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries changing to a few rain showers early this afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NDT Monday 10 April 2023
